description: As they go through the paces of their normal workout routine, it becomes fairly obvious that James Jameson & Gavin Waters have some pent up energy that needs displacing. When some light bag work fails to ?get it all out,' they resort to some hand to hand combat and grappling. When this also fails to do the trick, they proceed to a contact sport that is slightly more intimate: hot naked sexual satisfaction. Ditching their less productive hand to hand physical activity, the two engage in a more traditional, time-tested method for working the muscles- namely, blowjobs & fucking in multiple positions, culminating in a warm splash of jizz for each and the sweet relief of well-earned exhaustion.     Enjoy!
title: Working The Bag
